text: *Kasper Juul Hermansen* posted an update for *Daily Standup*

attachments.fallback:
How do you feel today?
I feel great. Thought slightly confused on how to process with my microservice platform
attachments.text: I feel great. Thought slightly confused on how to process with my microservice platform
attachments.title: How do you feel today?

attachments.fallback:
What did you do since yesterday?
I watched a bunch on talks and read resources on Message based architecture (Eventual consistency)
attachments.text: I watched a bunch on talks and read resources on Message based architecture (Eventual consistency)
attachments.title: What did you do since yesterday?

attachments.fallback:
What will you do today?
I will probably see if I can find some more concrete resources on Message based architecture. I will also move GitLab stuff from public gitlab, to Aarhus University based GitLab
attachments.text: I will probably see if I can find some more concrete resources on Message based architecture. I will also move GitLab stuff from public gitlab, to Aarhus University based GitLab
attachments.title: What will you do today?

attachments.fallback:
Anything blocking your progress?
I am awaiting responses from online posts on how to proceed. I lack information on how to built a proper message based architecture. I am also figuring out if ISTIO is the right choice, it seems to introduce much unneeded complexity, that I am not sure we can afford
attachments.text: I am awaiting responses from online posts on how to proceed. I lack information on how to built a proper message based architecture. I am also figuring out if ISTIO is the right choice, it seems to introduce much unneeded complexity, that I am not sure we can afford
attachments.title: Anything blocking your progress?

attachments.pretext:
Participation: *50%*
Keep up the good work! :tada:
